### High Voltage Training Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number**: 3943582890
* **Amendment Number**: 2/2
* **Solicitation Number**: 3943582890
* **Publication Date**: March 30, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: April 27, 2023, 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Date**: April 5, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 16, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: July 26, 2029

#### Request for Proposal

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites you to submit a proposal for the provision of high voltage (HV) safety training, marine electrical propulsion theory training, and practical instruction on live HV systems.

This training is required to meet the technical competency standards outlined in the Standards of Training, Certification, and Watch keeping for Seafarers Code (STCW 2010 Manila) for individuals working with "High Voltage" systems.

#### Contract Information

The resulting contract will be a firm fixed-price contract with a two-year base period. Canada has irrevocable options to extend the term of the contract by up to three additional one-year periods, as specified in the contract clauses.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price. All proposals must meet the minimum technical requirements outlined in the solicitation.

#### Solicitation Documents

The solicitation documents, including the bid solicitation package and any amendments, can be downloaded from the Ariba Discovery platform.
